### HTMXSSEConnector

>  HTMXSSEConnector ()

*Provides helper functions for setting up HTMX SSE connections without
hardcoding specific implementations.*

``` python
# Initialize the HTMX SSE Connector
htmx_sse = HTMXSSEConnector()
```
